tasks.task: Attending to a sustainability agreement for Menorca's agricultural practices.
subtasks: Participating in environmental stewardship programs.
Committing to sustainable agricultural methods.
Receiving support from the Government of Menorca (Gov Menorca) for transition.
Performing soil analysis.
Providing soil management recommendations.
Implementing directed grazing practices.
Obtaining necessary materials for grazing.
Restoring rainwater harvesting systems.
Utilizing solar power pumps for water systems.
Applying key line landscaping techniques for water retention.
Installing covers on rainwater canals and swales to prevent evaporation.
Monitoring bio-indicators using citizen science.
Creating water sources for wildlife.
Installing nesting boxes for natural pest control.
Implementing practices for increased crop resilience.
Conducting natural value inventories of farms.
Maintaining and restoring forested areas.
Managing and restoring wild pasture lands.
Organizing monthly volunteering sessions for habitat conservation.
Removing agricultural waste.
Installing traditional wild olive tree gates.
Restoring dry stone walls for fruit tree protection.
Additional activities like training, consulting, and public education.
